meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of an adenoma.
meanings.sent1: The doctor identified the adenomatous growth in the patient's colon.
meanings.sent2: The adenomatous tissue showed abnormal cell growth.
meanings.sent3: The adenomatous lump in the scan looked like a tiny alien spaceship.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were an adenomatous maze, twisting and turning without clear direction.
meanings.sent5: The adenomatous nature of the tumor made it difficult to remove completely.

meanings.sent1: The new medication had an adenomatous shape similar to the tumor.
meanings.sent2: The adenomatous growth in the lab sample closely mimicked the real tumor.
meanings.sent3: The adenomatous cloud in the sky looked like a fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an adenomatous garden, blooming with ideas waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the adenomatous essence of the landscape perfectly.
